SAP Quality Management w/ Production Planning (PP) ConsultantJob ID GBS-0694318 Job type Full-time RegularWork country USA Position type ProfessionalWork city - Any Posted 02-Sep-2015Travel Up to 4 days a week (home on weekends-based on project requirements) Job area Consulting & ServicesBusiness group Global Business Services Job category ConsultantBusiness unit ConServ Job role Package Solution Consultant Job role skillset SAP.SCM.QMCommissionable/Sales-Incentive jobs only NoJob descriptionThe SAP Quality Management (QM) Consultant should possess expertise in the area of Quality Management and leverage this knowledge to design and develop client solutions. The candidate will be responsible for assisting clients in the selection, implementation, and support of SAP focusing on the Quality Management component. Candidate should be familiar with various integration points and interface options with SAP as it relates to Quality Management. This individual provides leadership, direction, & mentoring to the team as well as manages client relationships.IBM Global Business Services: Join a Leader. Consult with us.IBM Global Business Services helps top-tier clients solve their most complex business and technical issues. As a GBS SAP consultant, you will deliver innovative business consulting, business process design, systems integration, and application design and management to leading commercial and public sector organizations in 17 industries worldwide. With access to resources that only a global leader can provide, as a consultant you will learn valuable skills, gain access to a vast and diverse network of talented professionals, and enjoy unparalleled career, training, and educational opportunities.Visit ibm.com/consulting/careers for more information.Required * At least 2 years experience in Quality Management Process Transformation * At least 2 years experience in working with the SAP Quality Management module * Basic knowledge in knowledge of various integration and interface options for SAP QM * At least 2 years experience in Multiple, full life cycle, complex SAP PP-PI implementation using ASAP Methodology * At least 2 years experience in application development/process transformation * Readiness to travel Up to 4 days a week (home on weekends-based on project requirements) * English: Basic knowledge* At least 4 years experience in Quality Management Process Transformation * At least 4 years experience in working with the SAP Quality Management module * At least 2 years experience in knowledge of various integration and interface options for SAP QM * At least 4 years experience in Multiple, full life cycle, complex SAP PP-PI implementation using ASAP Methodology * At least 4 years experience in application development/process transformation * At least 4 years experience in consulting responsibilities with Supply Chain Management/Industrial clients on SAP engagements. * At least 4 years experience in at least 2 full lifecycle projects with SAP QM & PP modules * At least 4 years experience in Pharma and/or Life Science industries * English : IntermediateAdditional informationTo be an official applicant to IBM, you must submit a resume and online application. Resumes submitted remain active for six months.To all recruitment agencies: IBM only accepts resumes from agencies on our Approved Agency List. Please do not forward resumes to our applicant tracking system, IBM employees, or send to any IBM company location. IBM is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.As the majority of our work is performed at client sites with significant travel required, applicants must live near major metropolitan airports. IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status. Company info International Business Machines Corp.
